AdjustableContainer.attach.description: attaches your container to a border

AdjustableContainer.bottom.description: one of the borders the container can be attached to

AdjustableContainer.top.description: one of the borders the container can be attached to

AdjustableContainer.left.description: one of the borders the container can be attached to

AdjustableContainer.right.description: one of the borders the container can be attached to
